proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida is losing 300 hours a year on proposals. Here is exactly where it goes.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, Shida spends hours manually crafting proposals. With our system, generate them in just 47 seconds.
proposal1.problemsIntro: Each of these issues is draining your resources and potential revenue.

problems.title: Time Drain
problems.description: Each proposal takes over 5 hours to create. That is 5 hours not spent on designing innovative graphics for clients.

problems.title: Revenue Loss
problems.description: Spending time on proposals instead of client work costs Shida an estimated $15,000 annually in lost design projects.

problems.title: Client Retention Risk
problems.description: Delayed proposals can frustrate clients. This could mean losing recurring contracts worth $20,000 a year.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manually creating proposals leads to inconsistencies that misrepresent Shida's brand. This can cost up to 10% of potential new client conversions.

problems.title: Competitive Disadvantage
problems.description: Competitors using faster methods can respond 3 times quicker. This is costing you an estimated 5 clients annually.

problems.title: Employee Burnout
problems.description: Your team is spending 25% of their time on proposals. This leads to burnout and decreased productivity in design work.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these inefficiencies with precision and speed.

solutions.title: Instant Proposal Generation
solutions.description: Currently, proposals are crafted manually, consuming hours. Our system generates them instantly, saving you time.

solutions.title: Consistent Branding
solutions.description: Manual proposals risk brand mismatches. Our system ensures every proposal aligns with Shida's brand identity.

solutions.title: Enhanced Client Experience
solutions.description: Delayed proposals frustrate clients. With our system, proposals are timely, improving client satisfaction.

solutions.title: Competitive Edge
solutions.description: Manual methods make you slower than competitors. Our system gives you the speed to win more clients.

solutions.title: Employee Focus
solutions.description: Currently, your team is bogged down by proposal writing. With our system, they focus on creative design work.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Elevate Acme Corp's Brand with Shida's Expert Graphic Design.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We propose a comprehensive engagement plan to transform your brand identity and improve customer retention.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Acme Corp is currently losing potential revenue due to several key issues.

problems.title: Low Conversion Rate
problems.description: The current website design results in a 30% higher bounce rate than industry standards. Every lost visitor is potential revenue slipping away.

problems.title: Inconsistent Branding
problems.description: Disjointed branding across platforms results in a 25% decrease in customer recognition, reducing repeat business opportunities.

problems.title: Outdated Visuals
problems.description: Stale visuals result in a 20% drop in user engagement on digital platforms, impacting overall sales and brand perception.

problems.title: Poor User Experience
problems.description: Complicated navigation leads to a 40% abandonment rate in online shopping carts, directly affecting sales figures.

problems.title: Ineffective Marketing Materials
problems.description: Marketing materials fail to communicate the unique value proposition, leading to a 15% decrease in lead generation.

problems.title: Unclear Brand Message
problems.description: A vague brand message causes a 35% drop in consumer trust and loyalty, impacting long-term growth.

proposal2.solutionIntro: We have tailored solutions that address these critical losses.

solutions.title: Visual Identity Overhaul
solutions.description: Revamp your brand's visual elements to ensure consistency and appeal. This will enhance customer recognition and loyalty.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Improve user experience through intuitive design, reducing bounce rates and increasing conversions.

solutions.title: Marketing Collateral Design
solutions.description: Create compelling marketing materials that clearly communicate your value, boosting lead generation.

solutions.title: Brand Strategy Development
solutions.description: Craft a clear brand message that resonates with your audience, fostering trust and loyalty.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida is your ideal partner for transforming Acme Corp's brand.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With years of experience, we deliver top-tier graphic design solutions tailored to your needs.

whyUsCards.title: Strategic Approach
whyUsCards.description: Our strategic plans are data-driven and focused on measurable outcomes.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize understanding your business to create customized solutions that fit.

whyUsCards.title: Award-Winning Team
whyUsCards.description: Our team has been recognized for excellence in design and innovation.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team committed to your success.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads strategy and client relationships with a focus on delivering impactful design solutions. His expertise ensures that every project exceeds expectations.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Research
process.description: We start by understanding your brand, market, and goals.

process.title: Strategy Development
process.description: We create a tailored strategy to guide all design efforts.

process.title: Design & Implementation
process.description: We execute the design work, ensuring alignment with your brand strategy.

process.title: Review & Launch
process.description: We finalize the project and prepare for a successful launch.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose the investment tier that aligns with your business goals.

pricing.name: Comprehensive Package
pricing.description: Recommended for businesses seeking a full brand overhaul.

pricing.name: Premium Partnership
pricing.description: Best for companies looking for ongoing strategic support.

proposal2.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Acme Corp's Brand?
proposal2.ctaDescription: Let's have a conversation about your vision and how we can bring it to life.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
